channel.title: Cord x Clay
channel.description: Recent content on Cord x Clay

item.title: SPECKLED CUPS
item.description: Hand thrown on the wheel in iron rich clay, and dipped in a white glaze. Includes our signature tumblers with a thumb hold (“thumblers”). Feels lovely in the hand!

item.title: COLORED WEAVINGS
item.description: All tapestries are handwoven using various types of fiber and upcycled fabric remnants. (First photo taken by Bloc Memoire Photography.)

item.title: SAPPHIRE series
item.description: Deliciously drippy and textured. This is one of our favorite glazes for our deep ramen bowls.

item.title: NEUTRAL WEAVINGS
item.description: All tapestries are handwoven using various types of fiber and upcycled fabric remnants.

item.title: BLUE OMBRE series
item.description: Pieces are dipped in a speckled blue glaze, for a graduated effect.

item.title: EARRINGS
item.description: Playful and unique pieces for the ear. These are all hand-wrapped using natural fiber and fabric remnants.

item.title: PLANTERS
item.description: A collection of modern wheel-thrown planters.

item.title: JARS
item.description: A collection of modern ceramic jars and trinket boxes.

item.title: NECKLACES
item.description: These statement pieces are handwoven or wrapped by hand.

item.title: SPECKLED DINNERWARE
item.description: These plates and bowls are thrown in speckled clay, and have a clean and modern shape.

item.title: VASES
item.description: Our vases are one-off pieces, delicately wheel-thrown.

item.title: CHARCOAL series
item.description: Thrown in velvety black clay, these pieces are glazed in hues of deep blue-green or white. To reveal the unique beauty of the black clay, much of it is left unglazed and exposed. This series is no longer available.
